item.description:
PWP is a supportive, caring social group for parents without a married partner.
We invite you to attend an Orientation meeting to learn more about us. October Orientations are scheduled for Tuesday, October 14th, Friday, October 24th and Tuesday, October 28th.



Tuesday meetings are held at The Woburn United Methodist Church at 523 Main Street Woburn:

Take 128 to exit 35. You will come to a rotary. Take the exit marked 38 South/Main Street . From there, head down Main Street for about 2 miles. On the left before you enter Woburn center, you will see a large white church across the street from a 7-11. Take the left after the church onto Harlow Court . We meet in the building behind the main church.



Directions to Friday's meeting at Panera Bread in Burlington:

Rte 128 to exit 33A-3 South. You must veer right off the exit. About 1 mile down the road, you will see a plaza on your left containing Roche Bros, CVS, Outback Steakhouse etc. Take a left at those lights. Panera is on the left side of the plaza.



If you have any questions, please check out our website at www.pwp817.com or email Patty at pwporientation@comcast.net.
item.name: Parents Without Partners Orientation
